typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AboutMe} as string,
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcUsers
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcDimUser
SelectCleaningName, FilterOnlyLastRow join(Source_UserId == UserSk,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinDimUser
SrcDimUser filter(isNull(EndDate)) ~> FilterOnlyLastRow
DrvDateCols split(!isNull(UserId) && Source_Location != Location,
	isNull(UserId)
|| Source_AccountId!= AccountId 
|| Source_DisplayName != DisplayName,
	disjoint: false) ~> Cs@(SCD2Location, UpsertChange)
JoinDimUser derive(NewStartDate = currentUTC(),
		NewEndDate = currentUTC()) ~> DrvDateCols
Cs@SCD2Location alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterUpdateOldRow
Cs@UpsertChange alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterUpsert
SrcUsers select(mapColumn(
		Source_AboutMe = {_AboutMe},
		Source_AccountId = {_AccountId},
		Source_CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		Source_DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		Source_UserId = {_Id},
		Source_Location = {_Location}
	)) ~> SelectCleaningName
AlterUpdateOldRow sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UserId'],
	mapColumn(
		Location = Source_Location,
		UserId,
		EndDate = NewEndDate
	)) ~> DestUpdateOldRows
AlterUpsert sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UserSk']) ~> DestUpsert
Cs@SCD2Location sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		DisplayName as string,
		Location as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> DestNewHistoricalRow
